text: Les Éditions Doberman-Yppan (Doberman-Yppan) is a Canadian music publishing firm. The company's headquarters is based in Lévis, Quebec. The publishing company has been acquired in 2010 by Canadian publisher Les Productions d’OZ. ==Notable Publications== *Prelude and Fugue by Marc-André Hamelin *Concerto for Guitar and string orchestra by Jacques Hétu *Suite pour guitare by Jacques Hétu *Works of Welsh composer Stephen Goss *All published arrangements by David Russell *More than 125 guitar works by Roland Dyens *Many recent works by Sergio Assad ==External links== * Les Éditions Doberman-Yppan - Official site Category:Music publishing companies of Canada Category:Sheet music publishing companies Category:Companies based in Lévis, Quebec
title: Doberman-Yppan
